items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on recent user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: Compliance with GDPR for user data handling

notes: Assumed the requirement focuses on personalized recommendations for logged-in users; guest user recommendations may be addressed separately.
